name: Canada
startIntroPart2: Peace is our strategy, war is unnecasery.
defeated: It was a nice go, have a good one.
afterPeace: We hope you enjoy our peace, as it shall last long
tradeRequest: Canada's art of negotiation, is there talent?
uniques: All units move through Forest and Jungle Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads. These tiles can be used to establish City Connections upon researching the Wheel.
+[20]% Strength if within [1] tiles of a [Forest]
+[20]% Strength if within [1] tiles of a [Swamp]
Earn [50]% of [military] opponent's [Strength] as [Happiness] for kills
